name: Robo Stare Down a SteamVR Game
name_original: Robo Stare Down a SteamVR Game
description:
Requires a SteamVR Compatible VR HMD

Stare at robots to make them explode before they shoot you !!! no controller needed just look at things with your VR HMD .

This is a prototype just to see how this kind of VR game feels . In an update at some point in the future There will be power-ups and The robots will come at you in waves from all different directions and there will be multiple maps .
